name: MonkeyLearn / Medallia Text Analytics
features: Omnichannel Analytics (Surveys, Social Media, Reviews, Emails, Conversations, Voice, etc.)

pricing.model: Subscription-based. API plan with monthly fee and query limits. Studio plan with custom pricing.

api_plan.notes: Starting price for API plan. May have overage fees or limitations. See Capterra and TrustRadius for details.

studio_plan.notes: Contact MonkeyLearn/Medallia for Studio plan pricing.

cons: Pricing can be considered high for startups
Information may be limited as MonkeyLearn is now part of Medallia

user_reviews.summary: Mixed reviews on pricing. User-friendly platform with good features, but can be expensive for startups. Requires further research from external review sites (G2, Capterra, TrustRadius) for detailed reviews of Medallia Text Analytics.

integration_capabilities: Integrates with various platforms and data sources (surveys, social media, etc.)
description: MonkeyLearn, now part of Medallia Text Analytics, is a platform for analyzing unstructured text data from various customer feedback channels. It offers features like sentiment analysis, topic extraction, keyword extraction, and text classification using pre-built and customizable models. The platform aims to provide actionable insights from customer feedback to improve customer experience, integrating with Medallia's broader experience management suite.

use_cases.title: Voice of the Customer Analysis
use_cases.description: Analyze feedback from surveys, reviews, social media, and support interactions
use_cases.example: Identify key themes and sentiment drivers in customer feedback across all channels

use_cases.title: Support Ticket Automation
use_cases.description: Classify and route incoming support tickets automatically
use_cases.example: Tag tickets based on topic (e.g., billing, technical issue) and urgency

use_cases.title: Product Feedback Analysis
use_cases.description: Extract insights from product reviews and feature requests
use_cases.example: Identify frequently mentioned features or bugs in user reviews

use_cases.title: Market Research
use_cases.description: Analyze online conversations and news articles for market trends
use_cases.example: Track competitor mentions and sentiment in online forums
